name: easefully
content:
easefully adverb
(COMFORTABLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a comfortable and relaxed way: She stood easefully watching the preparations for the party. Children tend to move easefully and naturally to music.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was easefully slouched on the sofa, gazing at the TV screen.He turned to her easefully and asked her to follow him.She leaned easefully back in her chair before answering.
